title: Zamorelia: Cooling Capsule Safe Tower with Nuclear Route Schematic, Bottom Circle Cooler; Side Level Flow Division with Large Metallic Tunnel; Six Stations Connected with Tri-level Center Producer, Right Side Community Chrysalis and Upside Down Safety Dome; Secret Yellow Evacuation Area; Cream Gloss Top Grid; Blue Circle Counter Journey Charms
